siminov.connect.service

Class AsyncServiceWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • siminov.connect.service.AsyncServiceWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWorker

    public class AsyncServiceWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWorker
    It provides implementation for IWorker. It processes all service ASYNC requests
